verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto Aaron<WH175>, and say<WH559> unto him<WH5927>, When thou lightest the lamps<WH5216>, the seven<WH7651> lamps<WH5216> shall give light<WH215> in front<WH6440> of the candlestick<WH4501>.
And Aaron<WH175> did<WH6213> so<WH5927>; he lighted the lamps<WH5216> thereof so as to give light in front<WH4136> of the candlestick<WH4501>, as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.

And this was the work<WH4639> of the candlestick<WH4501>, beaten<WH4749> work of gold<WH2091>; unto the base<WH3409> thereof<WH6525>, and unto the flowers thereof<WH4749>, it was beaten work: according unto the pattern<WH4758> which Jehovah<WH3068> had showed<WH7200> Moses<WH4872>, so he made<WH6213> the candlestick<WH4501>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
Take <WH3947> the Levites<WH3881> from among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and cleanse them<WH2891>.

And thus shalt thou do<WH6213> unto them<WH2891>, to cleanse them<WH5137>: sprinkle the water<WH4325> of expiation<WH2403> upon them<WH8593>, and let them cause a razor to pass over all their flesh<WH1320>, and let them wash<WH3526> their clothes<WH899>, and cleanse themselves<WH2891>.

Then let them take<WH3947> a young<WH1121> bullock<WH6499>, and its meal-offering<WH4503>, fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>; and another<WH8145> young<WH1121> bullock<WH6499> shalt thou take<WH3947> for a sin-offering<WH2403>.

And thou shalt present<WH7126> the Levites<WH3881> before<WH6440> the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>: and thou shalt assemble<WH6950> the whole<WH6950> congregation<WH4150> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>:
and thou shalt present<WH7126> the Levites<WH3881> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>. And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall lay<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> upon the Levites<WH3881>:

and Aaron<WH175> shall offer<WH5130> the Levites<WH3881> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> for a wave-offering<WH8573>, on the behalf of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, that it may be theirs to do<WH5647> the service<WH5656> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

And the Levites<WH3881> shall lay<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> upon the heads<WH7218> of the bullocks<WH6499>: and offer<WH6213> thou the one<WH259> for a sin-offering<WH2403>, and the other<WH259> for a burnt-offering<WH2403>, unto Jehovah<WH3068>, to make atonement<WH3722> for the Levites<WH3881>.
And thou shalt set<WH5975> the Levites<WH3881> before<WH6440> Aaron<WH175>, and before<WH6440> his sons<WH1121>, and offer<WH5130> them for a wave-offering<WH8573> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.
Thus shalt thou separate<WH914> the Levites<WH3881> from among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; and the Levites shall be mine<WH3881>.

And after<WH310> that shall the Levites<WH3881> go in<WH935> to do the service<WH5647> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>: and thou shalt cleanse<WH2891> them<WH5130>, and offer them for a wave-offering<WH8573>.

For they are wholly given<WH5414> unto me from among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; instead of all that openeth<WH6363> the womb<WH7358>, even the first-born<WH1060> of all the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, have I taken them unto me<WH3947>.

For all the first-born<WH1060> among the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> are mine<WH120>, both man and beast<WH929>: on the day<WH3117> that I smote<WH5221> all the first-born<WH1060> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> I sanctified them for myself<WH6942>.
And I have taken<WH3947> the Levites<WH3881> instead of all the first-born<WH1060> among the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

And I have given<WH5414> the Levites<WH3881> as a gift<WH5414> to Aaron<WH175> and to his sons<WH1121> from among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, to do<WH5647> the service<WH5656> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, and to make atonement<WH3722> for the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; that there be no plague<WH5063> among the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, when the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> come nigh<WH5066> unto the sanctuary<WH6944>.

Thus did<WH6213> Moses<WH4872>, and Aaron<WH175>, and all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, unto the Levites<WH3881>: according unto all that Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872> touching the Levites<WH3881>, so did<WH6213> the children<WH1121> of Israel unto them<WH3478>.

And the Levites<WH3881> purified<WH2398> themselves from sin<WH3526>, and they washed their clothes<WH899>: and Aaron<WH175> offered<WH5130> them for a wave-offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>; and Aaron<WH175> made atonement<WH3722> for them to cleanse them<WH2891>.

And after<WH310> that went<WH935> the Levites<WH3881> in to do<WH5647> their service<WH5656> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> before<WH6440> Aaron<WH175>, and before<WH6440> his sons<WH1121>: as Jehovah<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872> concerning the Levites<WH3881>, so did they unto them<WH6213>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

This is that which belongeth unto the Levites<WH3881>: from twenty<WH6242> and five<WH2568> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> they shall go in<WH935> to wait<WH6633> upon the service<WH5656> in the work of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>:
and from the age<WH1121> of fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> they shall cease<WH7725> waiting<WH6635> upon the work<WH5656>, and shall serve no more<WH5647>,

but shall minister<WH8334> with their brethren<WH251> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, to keep<WH8104> the charge<WH4931>, and shall do<WH5647> no service<WH5656>. Thus shalt thou do<WH5647> unto the Levites<WH3881> touching their charges<WH4931>.
